main_definition: The word 'themselves' is a reflexive pronoun used to indicate that the subject of the sentence performs an action upon itself or refers back to the same individuals previously mentioned in the context.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Reflecting on one's own actions or qualities
meanings_and_examples.example: They couldn't help but reflect on themselves and their past mistakes.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Giving attention to oneself in a particular situation
meanings_and_examples.example: After the long day, they decided to give themselves some relaxation time.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicating that an action is performed by the same individuals previously mentioned
meanings_and_examples.example: The team members completed the project themselves without any external help.
